SqlOperation.Name: GetAllByUserId
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT w.* FROM `wspc_workspaces` w INNER JOIN `wspc_workspace_members` wm ON w.Id = wm.WorkspaceId WHERE wm.UserId = @UserId
